user.title: Connect to comma.ai
user.description: Enter your comma.ai JWT token. You can get it from https://jwt.comma.ai

reconfigure.title: Update JWT Token
reconfigure.description: Enter a new JWT token for {username}. Get a fresh token from https://jwt.comma.ai (tokens expire after 90 days)

error.invalid_auth: Invalid JWT token. Please check your token and try again.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to comma.ai API. Please try again later.

abort.already_configured: This comma.ai account is already configured.
